name: Tabliss
description: A custom Tabliss extension I've made for myself.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://oauth2.googleapis.com https://www.googleapis.com https://api.unsplash.com https://*.giphy.com https://api.open-meteo.com https://geocoding-api.open-meteo.com https://api.tabliss.io https://quotes.rest https://nba.rickyg.io https://ipwho.is https://raw.githubusercontent.com https://v2.jokeapi.dev https://icons.duckduckgo.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https://images.unsplash.com https://*.giphy.com https://icons.duckduckgo.com
